version_description:
• DONKEY is back! Get your free 8-bit theme.
• Pull down to close history screen.
• Improve German text.

New Monochrome color theme. Remove all colors from the widget and app for the ultimate minimalist style. P.S. This new color theme looks great on the Compact widget.

Open Settings > Theme > Colors and scroll to the bottom for the new theme.

Super Sweet Stopwatch (^_^) Use the new DataMan Stopwatch widget to track an activity and see usage for a specific period of time.

• Tap Green ◎ - Start tracking
• Tap Red ◎ - Stop tracking
• Touch & hold Green ◎ - Flush display
• Tap text - Toggle display

Stopwatch widget is free for a limited time. No in-app purchase required (^_^)

• Even better DataMan for Apple Watch
• Amazingly fresh user interface
• Faster refresh of stats and colors
• Update support for Watch OS 1.0.1

* Apple Watch Complication * Simply raise your wrist to know if you're safe from busting your data cap. It's just one more way to help you stop overage.

Use the new modern and easy-to-read San Francisco font. Customize and choose from a range of fonts and colors.

NOTE: You'll need to install the new watchOS2 app. On iPhone, open Watch > My Watch > DataMan and tap Show App on Apple Watch.

The Force is strong with this one ^_^

・ Use The Force. Goto Theme > Font.
・ Support 28-day plan type.
・ Spanish and Dutch languages.
・ Winter Wonderland is back.

Get 3D Touch Quick Actions! Press the DataMan icon on the Home screen, and you can quickly see your history, change themes, or edit your data plan.

Plus, DataMan now speaks Italian. Ciao Italia!

Support for multiple watches and watchOS 2.2.

NOTE: You may need to reinstall the DataMan watch app after updating to watchOS 2.2.

Add the new Shortcuts widget, and you can quickly open your cellular and Wi-Fi settings.

Enjoy your summer watching fireflies with Theme > Font > Summer Fireflies.

Goto Theme > Colors and grab the hottest colors for summer.

Together with improved animations, DataMan is now even more beautiful to look at ^_^

Introducing the DataMan Store. Get more features for your DataMan. You can now add these extra features:

・ Hourly & Daily Stats. Get real-time usage statistics for every hour, every day. No more waiting for your carrier to update.

・ Monitor Network Connections. Uncover all connected host names and IP addresses, so you can analyze how they affect your data usage.

・ Export Stats. Add the capability to export your usage statistics and send the exported file using email.

・ Theme Pack. Add the Mini widget, plus unlock all colors, fonts and display styles. DataMan has never looked better!

Add support for Rollover / Carryover Data. Open Settings > Data Plan > Rollover Data. Great news for AT&T and Verizon customers :)

Customize your plan setup to support any billing period. Open Settings > Data Plan > Plan Type > N Days. Daily plan subscribers rejoice :)

New keyboard to enter usage values. You can finally enter decimal values :)

・ Improvements everywhere!
・ Smoother animated Summer theme. See Theme > Font > Summer Fireflies.
・ Worldwide keyboard to enter decimal numbers for usage. See Data Plan > Data Cap.
・ Faster 3D Touch Quick Action for History. Press the DataMan icon on your Home screen.
New glanceable and beautiful iOS 10 widgets. New faster watchOS 3 app and complication.

Happy holidays! It's the most wonderful time of the year. Enjoy the beautiful Winter Wonderland theme, free.

Get this free animated theme - Swipe Left > Settings > Theme > Font > Winter Wonderland.
It's Summer time! Enjoy the magical glow of fireflies. Get your free animated theme - Swipe Left > Settings > Theme > Font > Summer Fireflies.
Multilingual for iPhone X. And use the Force, Luke!

More complications. Add DataMan to the Infograph watch faces on your Apple Watch Series 4.

Use DataMan in your custom shortcuts. View a sample shortcut at www.xvision.me/support

Start your free trial. Access extra features with PRO subscription.

• Free trial 7 days
• Daily usage history
• Push usage alerts
• App icon badge
• Custom billing periods
• Rollover data
• Map usage locations
• Themes and more

Arise. The Force is strong with you ^_^ Goto Theme > Font.

BTW we've squashed a bug with our push notification server :)

Arise. The Force is strong with you ^_^ Goto Theme > Font.

BTW we've squashed a bug with our push notification server :)
Not much, just performance improvements.
Not much, just performance improvements.
The most wonderful time is here! New watchOS corner complication, New York font, and Snow. Goto Theme > Font.
The most wonderful time is here! New watchOS corner complication, New York font, and Snow. Goto Theme > Font.
DataMan action now gives you more outputs in Shortcuts. So you can use them to create advanced custom shortcuts based on your usage stats. View a sample shortcut at https://xvision.me/support
DataMan action now gives you more outputs in Shortcuts. So you can use them to create advanced custom shortcuts based on your usage stats. View a sample shortcut at https://xvision.me/support
Color your DataMan app icon! Swipe Left > Theme > App Icon.
Color your DataMan app icon! Swipe Left > Theme > App Icon.

Cheer up with DONKEY Bounce! Swipe Left > Theme > Font
#staysafe

Cheer up with DONKEY Bounce! Swipe Left > Theme > Font
#staysafe
